name: FlyInside Flight Simulator
description:
FlyInside Flight Simulator is a brand new flight simulator built for virtual reality! It ships with ten beautiful aircraft, and scenery for the continental USA. The software is in Open Beta/Early Access, so we're constantly working on new features, improvements, and fixes. You can expect a steady stream of updates, both major and minor.

Included aircraft:
  • MilViz B-55
  • MilViz 310R
  • MilViz T-50
  • MilViz DHC-3
  • MilViz 737-200
  • TFDi Design 717
  • MilViz T-38A
  • MilViz B-407
  • MilViz MD-530
  • MilViz CH-47D
